welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Farragut, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historical landmarks, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mc Ghee Tyson Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is a satellite terminal connected to the main terminal, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is a satellite terminal connected to the main terminal, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport by connecting to the TYS Free Wi-Fi network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rockwood Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Rockwood Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
